thread.title: Depraved sex abuser who targeted boys on 'Tagged' social networking site is jailed
thread.title_full: Depraved sex abuser who targeted boys on 'Tagged' social networking site is jailed

author: Rebecca Day
title: Depraved sex abuser who targeted boys on 'Tagged' social networking site is jailed
text:
News Depraved sex abuser who targeted boys on 'Tagged' social networking site is jailed Police began investigating Christopher Thompson after a tip-off from a Tagged employee that he was exchanging indecent images with a boy from Wigan Share Get daily   
A sexual predator who targeted young boys using a website called ‘Tagged’ has been jailed - after an employee at the social networking site spotted his indecent exchanges and alerted the police in America. 
Christopher Thompson was chatting to a 12-year-old boy from Leigh on the site and exchanging indecent images. 
An employee of the social networking site Tagged raised the alarm after discovering indecent images were exchanged between the pair. Read More Footage shows animal lover confront contractor killing rabbits to make way for new Metrolink line 
The victim was traced to Leigh in Wigan, and Thompson, of North Road, Darlington was identified as the offender. 
Thompson was arrested in July 2014 on suspicion of engaging in sexual activity in the presence of a child and released with strict bail conditions. 
Police then seized his laptop and found thousands of indecent images of children stored on it. 
In May 2015, Thompson was further arrested in Durham and remanded in custody, after he met an 11-year-old boy in a park, and took him to a garage where he engaged in sexual activities with him. Read More Two men taken to hospital after homophobic attack on tram 
After launching an investigation into him, the force seized a mobile phone and found more indecent images of children. 
He was also investigated by South Wales police and charged with further CSE offences, after he incited a man from Cardiff to rape a four-year-old boy, which the man did, and sent the video to Thompson to watch. 
He has now pleaded guilty to a myriad of sickening offences against children including engaging in a sexual act with a boy, storing indecent images of children, and inciting another man to rape a four-year-old. 
And the 26-year-old has been sentenced to 27 years and 8 months in prison at Teeside Crown Court. 
Det Con Kevin Byrne, of TITAN, the north west regional organised crime unit, said: “Firstly, I want to commend the victims for supporting our investigation, during what has been a difficult time. “With their help, we have been able to ensure Thompson is behind bars and cannot prey on any more young boys. 
“Thompson is a depraved individual who sexually abused children online to fulfil his sexual fantasies. Read More Man filmed yelling vile racist abuse at bus passenger 
“He knew full well how young the boys he abused were when he began his offending, and even continued his horrific acts after he had been arrested. 
“I hope today’s sentence demonstrates our commitment to pursuing sexual predators, no matter where they are or how long it takes.” Like us on Facebook
